name: Firefox: Curve tabs
description:
Put the curve bases to the bottom of the selected tab.
This is a solution for Bug 570279 https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=570279
Thank Spewboy, I used some of his images and codes from his Stratiform add-on.
